title: Mobile/fixed market share of Vodafone in its main markets 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.

In Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Mobile market had the highest Market share 463.0 among the 2 groups and in South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Fixed market had the lowest Market share 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, Mobile market had the highest Market share 463.0 in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and lowest value 174.0 in Country Spain.
There is a gap of 289.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Mobile market in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Spain.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

In Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Mobile market had the highest Market share 463.0 among the 2 groups and in South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group), Fixed market had the lowest Market share 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, Mobile market had the highest Market share 463.0 in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and lowest value 174.0 in Country Spain.
The maximum Market share for Mobile market that was found in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) was 2.66 times larger than the minimum Market share observed in Country Spain.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Market share was found in case of Mobile market.
On average, the Country Germany had the highest Market share for all 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market. Whereas United Kingdom had the lowest average Market share.
